title: Electric field direction at a point

content.question: Which of the following best represents the direction of the electric field at point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow that points downward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that points directly to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that points directly upward.
The figure shows an arrow that points upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that points directly to the right.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow that points directly to the right.
